INSERT INTO DELIVERY_DETAIL_CRM ( ID, VOUCHER_NO, ORDER_NO, WARES_NO, AMOUNT, PRICE, UNIT, TOTAL, REMARK, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waresNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_DELIVERY_DETAIL_CRM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE DELIVERY_DETAIL_CRM
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARES_NO = #{waresNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
